headline: Energy Storage Is Evolving, Says Straubel
summary: Tesla Inc. co-founder JB Straubel talks about the role of batteries in energy storage. "I don't think batteries are at odds with natural gas generation," Straubel, who now runs battery recycling company Redwood Materials Inc., said Thursday at BloombergNEF's Barrel of Tomorrow in the Age of AI summit in Houston.

headline: Former Amazon, Tesla Leader Joins The Nuclear Company as Chief Legal Officer
summary: WASHINGTON, September 23, 2025--The Nuclear Company, which is leading gigawatt-scale deployment of nuclear power across America and pioneering the modernization of nuclear construction, today announced the hiring of Robert Harmon as Chief Legal Officer. Harmon brings nearly 20 years of legal experience, including more than a decade at Amazon and Tesla that included overseeing the opening of Tesla’s global headquarters.

headline: Stock Market Today: Dow Off Session Highs; This Medical Giant Hits A Buy Zone (Live Coverage)
summary: The Dow Jones Industrial Average and other major indexes remained mixed in midday action Tuesday as investors awaited a speech from Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell.  Meanwhile, medical supplies giant McKesson broke out of a base while a tech player faced the prospect of stumbling a third straight session on the stock market today.  Blue chips on the Dow trimmed larger morning gains to 0.1%.

headline: Europe's plug-in hybrid boom helps Chinese carmakers outsell Renault, Audi in August, report shows
summary: Tesla's Model Y remained Europe's most popular battery-electric vehicle (BEV), but its sales dropped 37% from the same month last year despite growing BEV sales overall, data from the research firm showed.  Chinese automakers have ramped up exports of plug-in hybrid (PHEV) and hybrid electric vehicles (HEVs) to Europe and plan to build more models locally, minimising the impact of the European Union's tariffs on Chinese-made EVs.

headline: This Week In Energy Transition - Battery Storage Powers Forward With Project Alamo City
summary: OCI Energy has secured construction financing for Project Alamo City, a significant battery energy storage system in Texas, marking a notable development in the energy transition sector. The project, supported by ING's construction-to-term loan and related financing solutions, is set to enhance grid stability with a capacity of 120 MW and a 4-hour duration. This development underscores the growing importance of collaborative and innovative financing mechanisms in advancing clean energy...

headline: Telo Trucks raises $20 million to make compact electric pickup truck
summary: (Reuters) -Telo Trucks has raised $20 million in an oversubscribed Series A round to make its compact electric pickup, as the startup bets on a capital-efficient model to succeed in a market littered with failed EV challengers.  The funding, led by Telo co-founder and designer Yves Béhar and Tesla co-founder Marc Tarpenning, shows investors are still willing to back entrants despite a string of bankruptcies that followed the post-pandemic EV listing boom.  Other investors include Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff, E12 Ventures and Nova Threshold, Telo said on Tuesday.

raw.headline: Telo Trucks raises $20 million to make compact electric pickup truck
raw.summary: (Reuters) -Telo Trucks has raised $20 million in an oversubscribed Series A round to make its compact electric pickup, as the startup bets on a capital-efficient model to succeed in a market littered with failed EV challengers.  The funding, led by Telo co-founder and designer Yves Béhar and Tesla co-founder Marc Tarpenning, shows investors are still willing to back entrants despite a string of bankruptcies that followed the post-pandemic EV listing boom.  Other investors include Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff, E12 Ventures and Nova Threshold, Telo said on Tuesday.

headline: TELO Trucks Raises $20M Series A to Redefine Urban Pickup Trucks
summary: TELO Trucks, maker of the first electric mini truck built for U.S. cities, today announced its oversubscribed $20M Series A funding. This funding round was led by legendary designer Yves Behar, and Marc Tarpenning co-founder of Tesla and Venture Partner of Spero Ventures. Additional investment came from TO VC, E12 Ventures, Neo, Marc Benioff, Uncorrelated Ventures, Nova Threshold, MCJ, and others.
